title: If heaven gave you 1 hour to talk to someone you lost, who will it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: It will be my love…my ex boyfriend…my very first love…my very first boyfriend…I loved him madly…respected him, his passion and his struggle and adore his nature…craved for his soothing voice… though it was really short relationship… I felt for him like anything…it changed me completely…my nature, my behavior and showed me my both sides…the bestest one and the ugliest one too…I tried almost everything to get him back and also to forget him…saam, daam, dand, bhed and lot many horrible things…worst thing I feel is we broke up over phone…though it was long distance relationship…he didn't meet me single time post that over the phone break up…he listed down all the reasons of how I am not suitable for him…and how this relationship can't work… he never called me after that from his side…it was always me who used to call him, text him…at the end of call he used to say that he want me to get out of this and he himself will help me…but I never understood what that help will be… But over the time my friends and well wishers made me realize that he is not the person I think he is…he is lot different than what he portrayed… But my heart was not ready to accept this…whatever that person was, I felt in love with that character… I accept I m different…I have many ugly shades…but only thing I did pure heartedly was to love him…if he would have told me to change earlier…I would have changed…not everyone is born perfect…one need to be made aware of their flaws in gentle way and at right time and need to be given chance to work on it…and only thing I was sure of was that if I can ever change then I'll change for this person…I don't want to let him go at any cost… But nothing worked…. instead it brought out worse of me to the point I threatened him, got his family involved, tried to threaten his job..but even after all this that person has not called me not a single time or has mentioned any of my dids…Everytime I text him to say sorry..he replies back in same polite manner like nothing has happened…this increases my respect for him even more… It's been year now.. I still have his contact saved…he checks all my status updates…somewhere deep down I also update status so that I can see his “seen”… But now I have promised myself to stop my attempts to get him back…he is all gone…just one memory, one regret, one guilt I'll have till my last breath… Thought he is not dead yet but still if heaven give me one last hour to talk someone I lost it will be him…always… Because I feel death vanishes all the possibilities of getting that person back…but that one probability and one tiny unrealistic ray of hope is more painful than death.. I just want hear his voice that's it…whatever he says…I'll just listen him…
My parents and if God will allow to talk to only one of them, then I can pour my heart out infront of either of them and to tell you the truth I wish everyday some magical power to make this happen.
